entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
